ing: 1 teaspoon butter, or more to taste
1/8 teaspoon seasoning blend (such as VegetaÂ®), or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Simple savory oatmeal to spice up your morning! Low or no dairy, and as healthy as you want to make it. Great source of fiber. Now you can have your cereal at any time of the day."
ins: Mix water, oats, and a dash of salt together in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on 50% power until oatmeal is chewy and tender, about 5 minutes. Stir. Mix in butter, seasoning blend, salt, and pepper. Let stand for 1 minute before serving.
